content: अरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Departed, gone away; belonging to others, strange, unusual, foreign; distant, remote. (<ab>opp.</ab> स्व, नित्य or अमा); (<ls>Sāy.</ls> grieved, sorry दुःखित, अरममाण); inimical, hostile, (with whom one is not on speaking terms). {@--2@} Not fighting. --णं {@--1@} Moving, going. {@--2@} Entering into, being inserted. {@--3@} A refuge.
